comment:
Finally caught up.

I would like to mention that RP guilds are usually legit as hell, since they actually take the time to figure out more about the world and what's going on, so they take the game relatively seriously. Plus, most of them aren't bad players, either. Not the best, but they're not bad, and they can be relatively inclusive when given the opportunity. If we're going for one of the big three guilds, I'd vote for the Writ Keepers.
